title: The Exchange: Marco Polo 2.0
description:
Italy irked the United States by backing Beijing’s grand infrastructure plan. The country needs to improve ties with the People’s Republic to sell more wine and other exports, says Rome’s top China expert. Overcoming trade barriers will, however, require an EU team effort. See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
